episode_summary: In this episode, DJ Paris announces an upcoming live webinar featuring top producer Greg Pekarski, video expert Kim Rettberg, and coach Brett Scott. The webinar aims to equip agents with lead generation strategies, video marketing skills, and business improvement techniques. Listeners are encouraged to register for the event to gain actionable insights and elevate their real estate careers.
